statements: DELETE FROM UserPreferences WHERE notification_settings = true;
DELETE FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 1 AND theme_color = 'blue';
DELETE FROM UserPreferences WHERE notification_settings = true AND temperature_units = 'celsius';
DELETE FROM home_settings WHERE location = 'Living Room';
DELETE FROM home_devices WHERE device_id = (SELECT device_id FROM device_settings WHERE setting_name = 'brightness' AND setting_value = '100');
DELETE FROM control_preferences WHERE user_id = 5 AND control_type = 'light';
DELETE FROM device_preferences WHERE device_id = 123 AND user_id = 456;
DELETE FROM control_preferences WHERE user_id = 789 AND control_type = 'lighting';
DELETE FROM DevicePreferences WHERE status = TRUE;
